CustomField.description: The name of your accounting system's default accrual account. This should match the name used in your accounting software. Requires an Accounting Subledger Growth Edition license.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The name of your accounting system's default accrual account. This should match the name used in your accounting software. Requires an Accounting Subledger Growth Edition license.
CustomField.label: Default Accrued Account Code
